Typealiases.html#/s:4Moya5Imagea.name: Image

Structs/ProgressResponse.html#/s:4Moya16.abstract: The fraction of the overall work completed by the progress object.

Structs/ProgressResponse.html#/s:4Moya16.abstract: A Boolean value stating whether the request is completed.

Structs/ProgressResponse.html.name: ProgressResponse
Structs/ProgressResponse.html.abstract: A type representing the progress of a request.

Structs/AccessTokenPlugin.html.name: AccessTokenPlugin
Structs/AccessTokenPlugin.html.abstract: A plugin for adding basic or bearer-type authorization headers to requests. Example:

Protocols/TargetType.html#/s:4Moya10Targ.name: path
Protocols/TargetType.html#/s:4Moya10Targ.abstract: The path to be appended to baseURL to form the full URL.

Protocols/TargetType.html#/s:4Moya10Targ.name: method
Protocols/TargetType.html#/s:4Moya10Targ.abstract: The HTTP method used in the request.

Protocols/TargetType.html#/s:4Moya10Targ.name: sampleData
Protocols/TargetType.html#/s:4Moya10Targ.abstract: Provides stub data for use in testing.

Protocols/TargetType.html#/s:4Moya10Targ.name: task
Protocols/TargetType.html#/s:4Moya10Targ.abstract: The type of HTTP task to be performed.

Protocols/TargetType.html#/s:4Moya10Targ.name: validationType
Protocols/TargetType.html#/s:4Moya10Targ.abstract: The type of validation to perform on the request. Default is .none.

Protocols/TargetType.html#/s:4Moya10Targ.name: headers
Protocols/TargetType.html#/s:4Moya10Targ.abstract: The headers to be used in the request.

Protocols/AccessTokenAuthorizable.html#/.name: authorizationType
Protocols/AccessTokenAuthorizable.html#/.abstract: Represents the authorization header to use for requests.

Protocols/RequestType.html#/s:4Moya11Req.name: authenticate(user:password:persistence:)
Protocols/RequestType.html#/s:4Moya11Req.abstract: Authenticates the request with a username and password.

Protocols/PluginType.html#/s:4Moya10Plug.name: prepare(_:target:)
Protocols/PluginType.html#/s:4Moya10Plug.abstract: Called to modify a request before sending.

Protocols/PluginType.html#/s:4Moya10Plug.name: willSend(_:target:)
Protocols/PluginType.html#/s:4Moya10Plug.abstract: Called immediately before a request is sent over the network (or stubbed).

Protocols/PluginType.html#/s:4Moya10Plug.name: didReceive(_:target:)
Protocols/PluginType.html#/s:4Moya10Plug.abstract: Called after a response has been received, but before the MoyaProvider has invoked its completion handler.

Protocols/PluginType.html#/s:4Moya10Plug.name: process(_:target:)
Protocols/PluginType.html#/s:4Moya10Plug.abstract: Called to modify a result before completion.

Protocols/MoyaProviderType.html#/s:4Moya.name: request(_:callbackQueue:progress:completion:)
Protocols/MoyaProviderType.html#/s:4Moya.abstract: Designated request-making method. Returns a Cancellable token to cancel the request later.

Protocols/Cancellable.html#/s:4Moya11Can.name: isCancelled
Protocols/Cancellable.html#/s:4Moya11Can.abstract: A Boolean value stating whether a request is cancelled.

Protocols/Cancellable.html.name: Cancellable
Protocols/Cancellable.html.abstract: Protocol to define the opaque type returned from a request.

Protocols/MoyaProviderType.html.name: MoyaProviderType
Protocols/MoyaProviderType.html.abstract: A protocol representing a minimal interface for a MoyaProvider.

Protocols/PluginType.html.name: PluginType
Protocols/PluginType.html.abstract: A Moya Plugin receives callbacks to perform side effects wherever a request is sent or received.

Protocols/AccessTokenAuthorizable.html.name: AccessTokenAuthorizable
Protocols/AccessTokenAuthorizable.html.abstract: A protocol for controlling the behavior of AccessTokenPlugin.

Protocols/TargetType.html.name: TargetType
Protocols/TargetType.html.abstract: The protocol used to define the specifications necessary for a MoyaProvider.

Extensions/Method.html#/s:9Alamofire10HT.abstract: A Boolean value determining whether the request supports multipart.

Enums/MultiTarget.html#/s:4Moya11MultiTa.abstract: The HTTP method of the embedded target.

Enums/Task.html#/s:4Moya4TaskO26requestC.abstract: A request body set with Encodable type and custom encoder

Enums/Task.html#/s:4Moya4TaskO24uploadCo.abstract: A multipart/form-data upload task combined with url parameters.

Enums/Task.html#/s:4Moya4TaskO18download.abstract: A file download task to a destination with extra parameters using the given encoding.

Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO12.abstract: Indicates a response failed to map to an image.

Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO11.abstract: Indicates a response failed to map to a JSON structure.

Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO13.abstract: Indicates a response failed to map to a String.

Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO13.abstract: Indicates a response failed to map to a Decodable object.

Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO16.abstract: Indicates that Encodable couldn’t be encoded into Data

Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO10.name: statusCode
Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO10.abstract: Indicates a response failed with an invalid HTTP status code.

Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO10.name: underlying
Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO10.abstract: Indicates a response failed due to an underlying Error.

Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO14.abstract: Indicates that an Endpoint failed to map to a URLRequest.

Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO17.abstract: Indicates that an Endpoint failed to encode the parameters for the URLRequest.

Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO8r.name: response
Enums/MoyaError.html#/s:4Moya0A5ErrorO8r.abstract: Depending on error type, returns a Response object.

Enums/EndpointSampleResponse.html#/s:4Mo.abstract: The network returned a response, including status code and data.

Enums/EndpointSampleResponse.html#/s:4Mo.name: response
Enums/EndpointSampleResponse.html#/s:4Mo.abstract: The network returned response which can be fully customized.

Enums/EndpointSampleResponse.html#/s:4Mo.name: networkError
Enums/EndpointSampleResponse.html#/s:4Mo.abstract: The network failed to send the request, or failed to retrieve a response (eg a timeout).

Enums/ValidationType.html#/s:4Moya14Vali.name: successAndRedirectCodes
Enums/ValidationType.html#/s:4Moya14Vali.abstract: Validate success codes and redirection codes (only 2xx and 3xx).

Enums/ValidationType.html.abstract: Represents the status codes to validate through Alamofire.

Enums/MoyaError.html.name: MoyaError
Enums/MoyaError.html.abstract: A type representing possible errors Moya can throw.

Enums/MultiTarget.html.name: MultiTarget
Enums/MultiTarget.html.abstract: A TargetType used to enable MoyaProvider to process multiple TargetTypes.

Enums/AuthorizationType.html.name: AuthorizationType
Enums/AuthorizationType.html.abstract: An enum representing the header to use with an AccessTokenPlugin

Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.name: debugDescription
Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.abstract: A text description of the Response. Suitable for debugging.

Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.name: filter(statusCodes:)
Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.abstract: Returns the Response if the statusCode falls within the specified range.

Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.abstract: Returns the Response if it has the specified statusCode.

Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.name: filterSuccessfulStatusCodes()
Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.abstract: Returns the Response if the statusCode falls within the range 200 - 299.

Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.name: filterSuccessfulStatusAndRedirectCodes()
Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.abstract: Returns the Response if the statusCode falls within the range 200 - 399.

Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.name: mapImage()
Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.abstract: Maps data received from the signal into a UIImage.

Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.name: mapJSON(failsOnEmptyData:)
Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.abstract: Maps data received from the signal into a JSON object.

Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.name: mapString(atKeyPath:)
Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.abstract: Maps data received from the signal into a String.

Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.name: map(_:atKeyPath:using:failsOnEmptyData:)
Classes/Response.html#/s:4Moya8ResponseC.abstract: Maps data received from the signal into a Decodable object.

Classes/NetworkLoggerPlugin.html#/s:4Moy.name: isVerbose
Classes/NetworkLoggerPlugin.html#/s:4Moy.abstract: A Boolean value determing whether response body data should be logged.

Classes/NetworkActivityPlugin.html#/s:4M.name: willSend(_:target:)
Classes/NetworkActivityPlugin.html#/s:4M.abstract: Called by the provider as soon as the request is about to start

Classes/NetworkActivityPlugin.html#/s:4M.name: didReceive(_:target:)
Classes/NetworkActivityPlugin.html#/s:4M.abstract: Called by the provider as soon as a response arrives, even if the request is canceled.

Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.name: EndpointClosure
Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.abstract: Closure that defines the endpoints for the provider.

Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.name: RequestResultClosure
Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.abstract: Closure that decides if and what request should be performed.

Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.name: StubClosure
Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.abstract: Closure that decides if/how a request should be stubbed.

Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.name: endpointClosure
Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.abstract: A closure responsible for mapping a TargetType to an EndPoint.

Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.name: requestClosure
Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.abstract: A closure deciding if and what request should be performed.

Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.name: stubClosure
Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.abstract: A closure responsible for determining the stubbing behavior

Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.name: endpoint(_:)
Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.abstract: Returns an Endpoint based on the token, method, and parameters by invoking the endpointClosure.

Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.name: request(_:callbackQueue:progress:completion:)
Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.abstract: Designated request-making method. Returns a Cancellable token to cancel the request later.

Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.abstract: When overriding this method, take care to notifyPluginsOfImpendingStub and to perform the stub using the createStubFunction method.

Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.name: createStubFunction(_:forTarget:withCompletion:endpoint:plugins:request:)
Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.abstract: Creates a function which, when called, executes the appropriate stubbing behavior for the given parameters.

Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.name: notifyPluginsOfImpendingStub(for:target:)
Classes/MoyaProvider.html#/s:4Moya0A8Pro.abstract: Notify all plugins that a stub is about to be performed. You must call this if overriding stubRequest.

Classes/CancellableToken.html#/s:4Moya16.name: debugDescription
Classes/CancellableToken.html#/s:4Moya16.abstract: A textual representation of this instance, suitable for debugging.

Classes/Endpoint.html#/s:4Moya8EndpointC.abstract: A string representation of the URL for the request.

Classes/Endpoint.html#/s:4Moya8EndpointC.abstract: The HTTP header fields for the request.

Classes/Endpoint.html#/s:4Moya8EndpointC.abstract: Convenience method for creating a new Endpoint with the same properties as the receiver, but with added HTTP header fields.

Classes/Endpoint.html#/s:4Moya8EndpointC.name: replacing(task:)
Classes/Endpoint.html#/s:4Moya8EndpointC.abstract: Convenience method for creating a new Endpoint with the same properties as the receiver, but with replaced task parameter.

Classes/Endpoint.html#/s:4Moya8EndpointC.name: urlRequest()
Classes/Endpoint.html#/s:4Moya8EndpointC.abstract: Returns the Endpoint converted to a URLRequest if valid. Throws an error otherwise.
Note: If both Endpoints fail to produce a URLRequest the comparison will

Classes/Endpoint.html.name: Endpoint
Classes/Endpoint.html.abstract: Class for reifying a target of the Target enum unto a concrete Endpoint.

Classes/CancellableToken.html.name: CancellableToken
Classes/CancellableToken.html.abstract: Internal token that can be used to cancel requests

Classes/MoyaProvider.html.name: MoyaProvider
Classes/MoyaProvider.html.abstract: Request provider class. Requests should be made through this class only.

Classes/NetworkActivityPlugin.html.name: NetworkActivityPlugin
Classes/NetworkActivityPlugin.html.abstract: Notify a request’s network activity changes (request begins or ends).

Classes/NetworkLoggerPlugin.html.name: NetworkLoggerPlugin
Classes/NetworkLoggerPlugin.html.abstract: Logs network activity (outgoing requests and incoming responses).

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
